power_on.description: Power on all devices which supports it.
power_on.name: Power on

device.description: Address of device to select. Can be entity_id, physical address or alias from configuration.
device.name: Device

send_command.description: Sends CEC command into HDMI CEC capable adapter.

cmd.description: Command itself. Could be decimal number or string with hexadeximal notation: "0x10".
cmd.name: Command

dst.description: Destination for command. Could be decimal number or string with hexadeximal notation: "0x10".
dst.name: Destination

raw.description: Raw CEC command in format "00:00:00:00" where first two digits are source and destination, second byte is command and optional other bytes are command parameters. If raw command specified, other params are ignored.
raw.name: Raw

src.description: Source of command. Could be decimal number or string with hexadeximal notation: "0x10".
src.name: Source

send_command.name: Send command

standby.description: Standby all devices which supports it.
standby.name: Standby

volume.description: Increases or decreases volume of system.
volume.name: Volume
